channel.title: markdown on code.zoia.org
channel.description: Recent content in markdown on code.zoia.org

item.title: On Markdown and how to fork a project
item.description: Markdown and its syntax specification were developed by John Gruber as a text-to-HTML conversion tool for webwriters. Over the years, it has been widely adopted by sites likes GitHub and StackExchange. Most programming languages have some kind of Markdown library available, always developed not by Gruber but by some third party. The syntax for Markdown hasn’t been updated in years. Different implementations implement Markdown different… and output different HTML code for the same markdown.
